# BeforeSend Project - Next.js with TypeScript & Tailwind CSS

## Project Overview
BeforeSend is a premium SaaS application for checking message tone before sending. Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Key Features
- Large central text area for message input
- Tone checker dropdown with 4 persona options
- Clean, professional UI design
- "Check Tone" button for analysis
